Reviews.Title: “Pleasant hotel in Wilmersdorf area”
Reviews.Author: chrstphr d
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights de hotel situated classic german building spacious comfortable beds matrasses clean quiet relaxing offers breakfast sorts ham salami cheese fresh bread rolls yoghurts selection tees coffees juice hotel situated close berlin’s west city centre bus metro train links hotel expect capital wait including public transport overall enjoyed stay pleasant hotel welcoming staff
